title: mri_segment_thalamic_nuclei_dti_cnn
description: Thalamic segmentation tool providing 0.7mm isotropic thalamus segmentation from registered T1, FA, and V1 volumes.

t1_images.title: T1 images
t1_images.description: Path to the T1 image(s) or folder containing images. These must be registered to the FAs in physical coordinates.

aseg.title: ASEG segmentation
aseg.description: Path to the ASEG segmentation(s) or folder. These must be registered to the FAs in physical coordinates.

fa.title: FA images
fa.description: Path to the FA image(s) or folder.

v1.title: V1 images
v1.description: Path to the V1 image(s) or folder.

output.title: Segmentation output
output.description: Path to the segmentation output(s) or folder.

volume_output.title: Volume output
volume_output.description: CSV file for volumes of all structures and subjects.

posteriors_output.title: Posteriors output
posteriors_output.description: Path to the posteriors output(s) or folder.

threads.title: Number of threads
threads.description: Number of cores to be used. Default is 1.

force_cpu.title: Force CPU
force_cpu.description: Enforce running with CPU rather than GPU.

model.title: Model file
model.description: Path to an alternative model file.
